name: A Dream of Experiments
description:
You just woke up, where did you friends go?, why did you steal those books?. Now you are in serious problems.

Survive at the afternoon in your school while something, an experiment??? is chasing YOU. How does that even can walk!!! It should not have life.

  • Retro Style Game
  • Horror Gameplay
  • ONE live, and no cure available

Play Time: 20-40 minutes

Shaders by: Leaky Fingers

V. 1.01: 

  1. Fixed some bugs found.
  2. Ilumination changed
  3. Inventory Space changed
